def make_mocked_request(
    method: str,
    path: str,
    headers: Optional[LooseHeaders] = None,
    *,
    match_info: Optional[Dict[str, str]] = None,
    version: HttpVersion = HttpVersion(1, 1),
    closing: bool = False,
    app: Optional[Application] = None,
    writer: Optional[AbstractStreamWriter] = None,
    protocol: Optional[RequestHandler[Request]] = None,
    transport: Optional[asyncio.Transport] = None,
    payload: StreamReader = EMPTY_PAYLOAD,
    sslcontext: Optional[SSLContext] = None,
    client_max_size: int = 1024**2,
    loop: Any = ...,

test_source_code:
def test_https_scheme_by_ssl_transport() -> None:
    context = ssl.SSLContext(ssl.PROTOCOL_TLS_SERVER)
    req = make_mocked_request(
        "GET", "/", headers={"Host": "example.com"}, sslcontext=context
    )
    assert "https" == req.scheme
    assert req.secure is True
